Instructions.Value: This low cost light fire support tank became a mainstay of the AFFS after its introduction in the first decade of the 31st century. The C3 Variant/3061 Upgrade is a Kuritan version of the of the "3053" Striker. The SRM launchers and their ammunition are dropped for a single turret-mounted ER Medium Laser, the LRM15's ammunition is brought up to 16 rounds, and the tank is also given a Guardian ECM Suite and a C3 Slave. Wheeled: Fast in open ground, slow in rough terrain. Movement: 5/8 Hex: 150/240 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 130 20 Left 115 20 Right 115 20 Rear 100 20 Turret 120 20 Total 580 120
